text: Cross and Mauser () is a 1925 Soviet silent movie directed by Vladimir Gardin.КРЕСТ И МАУЗЕРКрест и маузер It stars Yevgeni Chervyakov, V. Kiselyova, and Vladimir Kriger. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin Category:1925 movies
title: Cross and Mauser
